application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by part Condition 3(b) (Submission of details - chimney breast) of listed building consent LB/23/04422 (Replacement windows at lower (closet), ground (closet) first (rear wall) and second (rear wall) floors at rear elevation; extension of closet wing extension; construction of new roof and creation of loft space at roof level; installation of air conditioning unit at roof level; replacement bi-folding French doors of two storey infill extension at lower ground on rear elevation; replacement of two storey infill extension at ground floor level; replacement pipes to rear elevations; partial excavation works to create lower terrace, and installation of steps to rear garden; reinstatement of fascia to front elevation; replacement windows at lower, ground, first and second floors at front elevation; replacement of fenestration to basement and front lightwell services cupboard; full replacement of staircase; and internal alterations at lower ground, ground, first, second and basement floor levels)
